title.rendered: New Feature: Advanced Email Alert Settings

content.rendered:
Codefresh can notify you about your build results through email. By default, email notifications are sent immediately when a build is successful or fails. We’ve made it easy to opt-in or out of email alerts in your account settings. We don’t want to flood your inbox with messages that aren’t relevant to you, so we updated the product to add more control. Now you have the option to only receive email notifications on your commits.

​

To access this feature, in your Codefresh account, click on the User Settings tab in the upper-right hand corner of your account profile.

If you don’t have a Codefresh account, sign up for free
